EmailTemplate.name: 202009_Americas_GDT_User-Growth_Instant-Pricing-Speedy-Checkout.202009_Americas_
EmailTemplate.subject: GoDirect Trade - Setting New Industry Standards
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Two things that only GoDirect Trade offers when you choose our marketplace for used aerospace parts - Instant pricing and speedy checkout.
So let’s work together and make things easy for you!
Do you send out quote requests because it’s just part of your process? Do you email sellers because they never post prices? Do you use a telephone to place an order?
Every time you need an aerospace part, check GoDirect Trade first. It takes a second to search and and sixty seconds to go through checkout stage.
Our marketplace has been featured in Forbes <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/moorinsights/2020/01/29/honeywell-demonstrates-that-its-an-iiot-not-just-an-ot-company]]>, The Wall Street Journal <[[https://www.wsj.com/articles/honeywell-brings-blockchain-to-used-aircraft-parts-market-11559072819]]> and Harvard Business Review <[[https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/pdf/Industries/manufacturing/abstract/HBR-TCS-WP-Nov-2019.pdf]]> and is rapidly moving from “small startup” to “major disruptor." Get your parts online and you will never want to do it “the old way” ever again. SHOP NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]> Stay safe,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirect Trade <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Buy_More]]>, Powered by Honeywell
